duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing excellent customer service and support to meet or exceed customer service goals.
Demonstrating initiative by proactively offering assistance and using suggestive selling techniques.
Using digital technology to enhance the customer shopping experience and promote digital brand engagement.
Focusing on results by meeting personal sales goals and reducing shrinkage in the area.
Maintaining professional dress standards and appearance, as well as supporting the Operations Team in merchandise display and promotion.
Accepting additional duties or sharing responsibilities during busy times and/or as requested by Sales Team Manager.

education_certification.credential: No education requirement. Experience in retail preferred.
